item.title: Help end else problem ';' expected!
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

Try this, you had forgot one simple ; after mmouse command

Here is fixed version, tell if it works:

procedure FindBitcomet;//finds BT and click it onece wait and random movemouse 5x. begin if(not(findBitmapin(bitcomet,rx,ry,TopLeftCornerX,TopLeftCornerY,ButtomRightCornerX,ButtomRightCornerY)or findbitmapin(bitcometwindowico,rx,ry,TopLeftCornerX,TopLeftCornerY,ButtomRightCornerX,ButtomRightCornerY)))then begin OpenAndClickBT;//procedure OpenBT.(above) end repeat if(findDTM(BTStopIcon,rx,ry,wholescreenTopX,wholescreenTopY,WholescreenButtomX,WholescreenButtomY))then begin mouse(rx+8,ry+8,randx,randy,true);//click on BT 1x wait(600); mouse(rx+8,ry+8,randx,randy,true); end until(not(findDTM(BTStopIcon,rx,ry,wholescreenTopX,wholescreenTopY,WholescreenButtomX,WholescreenButtomY))) end else begin if(findBitmapin(bitcomet,rx,ry,TopLeftCornerX,TopLeftCornerY,ButtomRightCornerX,ButtomRightCornerY)or findbitmapin(bitcometwindowico,rx,ry,TopLeftCornerX,TopLeftCornerY,ButtomRightCornerX,ButtomRightCornerY))then begin mouse(rx+8,ry+8,randx,randy,true);//click on BT 1x wait(600); mmouse(random(1000),random(500),random(50),random(50)); wait(300); mmouse(random(1000),random(500),random(50),random(50)); wait(300); mmouse(random(1000),random(500),random(50),random(50)); wait(300); mmouse(random(1000),random(500),random(50),random(50)); wait(300); mmouse(random(1000),random(500),random(50),random(50)); end else// if there's error then begin this step. begin writeln('Problem With The BitMap'); end; end; end;

Read full topic

item.title: Help end else problem ';' expected!
item.dc:creator: @Pyro Pyro
item.description:
@Pyro wrote:

because you have a else on a begin statement that isnt to do with a if statement. For example. You have procedure whatever then a begin straight after. How can you put a else on that statement?

Read full topic

item.title: Help end else problem ';' expected!
item.dc:creator: @eagertolearn eagertolearn
item.description:
@eagertolearn wrote:

hi i’m making this script and i know what the problem is, but i couldn’t find the solution plz help here’s the code.

procedure FindBitcomet;//finds BT and click it onece wait and random movemouse 5x. begin if(not(findBitmapin(bitcomet,rx,ry,TopLeftCornerX,TopLeftCornerY,ButtomRightCornerX,ButtomRightCornerY)or findbitmapin(bitcometwindowico,rx,ry,TopLeftCornerX,TopLeftCornerY,ButtomRightCornerX,ButtomRightCornerY)))then begin OpenAndClickBT;//procedure OpenBT.(above) end repeat if(findDTM(BTStopIcon,rx,ry,wholescreenTopX,wholescreenTopY,WholescreenButtomX,WholescreenButtomY))then begin mouse(rx+8,ry+8,randx,randy,true);//click on BT 1x wait(600); mouse(rx+8,ry+8,randx,randy,true); end until(not(findDTM(BTStopIcon,rx,ry,wholescreenTopX,wholescreenTopY,WholescreenButtomX,WholescreenButtomY))) end else begin if(findBitmapin(bitcomet,rx,ry,TopLeftCornerX,TopLeftCornerY,ButtomRightCornerX,ButtomRightCornerY)or findbitmapin(bitcometwindowico,rx,ry,TopLeftCornerX,TopLeftCornerY,ButtomRightCornerX,ButtomRightCornerY))then begin mouse(rx+8,ry+8,randx,randy,true);//click on BT 1x wait(600); mmouse(random(1000),random(500),random(50),random(50)); wait(300); mmouse(random(1000),random(500),random(50),random(50)); wait(300); mmouse(random(1000),random(500),random(50),random(50)); wait(300); mmouse(random(1000),random(500),random(50),random(50)); wait(300); mmouse(random(1000),random(500),random(50),random(50)) end else// if there's error then begin this step. begin writeln('Problem With The BitMap'); end; end; end;
